og.title: Gov Beshear Remarks Strong Numbers in 2nd kynect Enrollment Opening Week

article_metadata.author: Rob Canning

dc.title: Gov Beshear Remarks Strong Numbers in 2nd kynect Enrollment Opening Week

article_metadata.keywords: KYnect, carrie banahan, Kentucky Governor Steve Beshear

article_summary:
More than 521,000 Kentuckians enrolled in health care coverage through kynect during the first enrollment period that ran October 1, 2013 to March 15, 2014.
“Kentucky is the hands-down national leader in helping people access affordable health care," said Beshear.
Today Kentuckians began to review their options and apply for health coverage in 2015.
Open enrollment began last weekend and runs until February 15th, 2015.
"Our exchange, kynect, is the gold standard for ease of use and convenience.
